intro: Norrisia, commonly known as the velvetleaf, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Malvaceae. Norrisia species are often found in tropical and subtropical regions, thriving in moist, shaded environments. They are sometimes considered invasive in certain areas due to their rapid growth and ability to outcompete native vegetation.
